phrases: That was your conclusion when you guessed at what I wanted.
There is a firefight in the hangar.
There is one in here, as well.
Get us away from the battle zone at maximum combat speed.
I am terribly sorry, Count Klancain.
It was not my wish to get you involved.
This is part of my mission.
Yes, I came here under orders from His Majesty himself.
Emperor Rayregalia had misgivings regarding the subjugation of the Earth system
after the death of the previous Count Saazbaum.
And so, he commanded me to both investigate that and to ensure your safety.
Then I must get in contact with Grandfather!
It is possible to make contact.
Count Klancain, transmission from the moonbase.
Lord Klancain, where are you taking Princess Asseylum?
I am in the process of evacuating her to protect her from harm.
The moonbase is a fortified installation.
And yet, a battle was in progress there.
Rest assured, the enemies within the base have already been eliminated.
Earth was recovering, and humanity and nature were coexisting.
It was you who taught me this.
I have dispatched the Stygis Squadron to pursue.
Seize the ship at the first opportunity.
Count Klancain, please turn back at once.
I am afraid I cannot comply.
I must obey Princess Asseylum's orders.
The spaceship Hadriacus has vanished from our screens.
We need not worry about any pursuers for the time being.
But... what am I to do now?
Earth's military is trying to kill me.
And Slaine has the backing of the Orbital Knights, as well...
I must make contact with the crew of the Deucalion somehow.
There is one knight who is on your side.
The one who delivered the message from Inaho Kaizuka.
Now is the time to demonstrate my loyalty to Princess Asseylum.
Target the enemies off the ship's starboard bow!
Do not let them get close to the Deucalion!
Enemy formation closing in! 3 of the clock!
Increase AA cannon fire to starboard!
Looks like they got their results.
The real operation that used us as bait.
Order all units back to base!
They are on a return course!
Get them aboard AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
They fled when they saw that they were no match for us, eh?
Count Troyard, the UFE is withdrawing.
They are to rearm for our next offensive.
Does that belong to my sister?
Will I ever see her again?
What worries me is that the Analytical Engine is putting a strain on his cranial nerves.
I told him not to, but look at how far he expanded its domain...
He is ceded part of his brain to the machine.
I must do something to put an end to this war.
I will address all of the Orbital Knights.
With all due respect, that alone may not suffice.
From the very beginning, the Orbital Knights have desired to fight Earth and occupy it.
Count Troyard has given them a pardon to do just that in the form of a royal decree.
He has unified them with guarantees
of status in the new kingdom and Aldnoah activation privileges.
Princess Asseylum, it was his betrothal to you that clinched it.
If you simply call for an end to hostilities, you will only lose their trust.
As long as your younger sister is at his side, pretending to be you.
It is good to see you well.
Thank you for being so kind as to assist me.
You give me too much credit, Highness.
I am relieved to be able to repay my debt.
I have received reports that a part of your force went to the moonbase.
Would you mind explaining why, Capt.
If we lose the princess now, we lose any chance at peace for good.
Why would Slaine launch a war like this?
The Slaine I knew was kind, adored nature, and loved the Earth.
He was not someone who would engage in pointless war...
Why would he do this in spite of that?
Lord Slaine has not changed at all.
I do not know if his actions are right or wrong.
But he has always cared deeply for you.
He has always wished for what was best for you,
even if it jeopardized his position, or even his life.
Always... believing that you would awaken one day...
What you say is right, Eddelrittuo.
Are you able to make contact with Vers?
This is no time to stop at half measures.
I shall use the Hadriacus' audience chamber.
Operation will commence as planned at 1500 hours UTC.
Man your battle stations and stand by.
Lt. Marito, you are going into battle?
I would hoped to have one last drink with you, Doc,
That does not sound like you.
Well, we are in a low-pressure environment.
I do not want to drink myself sick.
This will not be the last time.
Is this one of those final showdown situations?
If we finish'them off, would not it be?
Whenever somebody dies in action, I guess that was the final showdown for him.
We are all going to make it back in one piece!
the UFE has begun to mass its forces.
What shall we do about them?
Launch all forces and intercept the UFE.
we will request the assistance of the Orbital Knights who back us.
We will launch an all-out offensive against the entire Earth.
They will know how it feels to have nowhere to go home to.
Take it easy for a while.
He is going to launch an all-out attack.
Is it almost time for the mission?
Something is come up that I have to do.
There is that face that says you are going even if I say not to.
And there is that voice that says I am going to be stubborn, so you may as well give in.
When you get back, let us have dinner together.
That is a death flag right there.
You are coming back alive, you got that?
Yeah, the Sleipnir Final Showdown spec!
Is not this payload a bit much, though?
Getting close enough to use this in a space battle would be nuts.
It looks like things are going to get nuts.
He is not taking this seriously at all!
Why are boys always like this?
Inaho, you are in no condition to go into battle.
Let us handle it from here!
Do you think you are some hotshot ace?
I have never thought that about myself.
Why are you acting like you do not see it?
If you go out now, you might not make it back this time!
There will not be another miracle like last time!
I do not want... to go through that again.
I cannot be the only one taking it easy.
At a time like this, the kindest thing to do is say nothing and see him off.
We need to worry about ourselves right now.
Compared to Inaho, our odds of survival are probably lower, you know?
How goes the subjugation of Earth?
I have come to you today to ask a favor regarding that.
I want you to make peace with Earth.
Please give a direct order to the Orbital Knights to cease fighting.
Do not let our assault falter...
Why do you hate Earth so?
What has become of my son?
Filthy Terrans, you killed my son...
That is what the ancients called this world.
For I have discovered a Martian superscience...
Mankind will make even greater strides.
Aldnoah is the technology we dreamed of...
And lead our people to happiness.
I ask you to put your rank and all of your connections at my disposal.
Thank you for your loyalty, Count Cruhteo.
I wish to address all Orbital Knights.
An all-out battle has begun between the moonbase and the United Forces of Earth.
My fellow knights who have gone down to the Satellite Belt and to the surface.
Launch a concerted attack against the UFE in your respective locations!
Demonstrate our vast power to the Terrans once again.
And show the UFE that resistance is
Hear me, Orbital Knights of Vers.
I am Asseylum Vers Allusia, Princess Royal of the Vers Empire.
The conflict began from a single spark, and has grown into a massive war.
It is being transmitted on all bands.
A multitude of people had myriad hopes and dreams that were at odds,
This is a sad thing indeed.
This war has brought me great sorrow.
I feel both shame and a deep regret over our use of power that was not meant for us.
and name myself Empress of the Vers Empire.
I also take Count Cruhteo, member of the Orbital Knights' 37 Clans,
We, the imperial family of the Vers Empire, wish to make peace with Earth!
